target.name: create-seq_post
create-post-trigger
target.description: Create post trigger for full-text indexing

target.name: create-post
drop-post-trigger
drop-post
target.pgsql: DROP TABLE "post_history" CASCADE; DROP TABLE "post" CASCADE;

target.name: load-post
print-post
target.pgsql: SELECT * FROM post where post_id < 0 ORDER BY post_thread_id DESC, post_left_id; SELECT * FROM post_history where post_history_parent_id < 0 ORDER BY post_history_parent_id DESC, post_history_created;

target.name: clear-post
target.pgsql: DELETE FROM post_history where post_history_parent_id < 0; DELETE FROM post where post_id < 0 or post_forum_id < 0;
